abstract: Italy falls into national soul-searching and finger-pointing one day after peaceful demonstration in Rome turned into riot; it is unclear why Italian authorities failed to prevent violence, or how it will reverberate in most volatile political climate country has seen in decades.
snippet: A day after violent youths transformed a peaceful demonstration to call attention to economic inequality into a riot, Italy fell into national soul searching and finger pointing.
lead_paragraph: A day after violent youths transformed a peaceful demonstration to call attention to economic inequality into a riot, Italy fell into national soul searching and finger pointing.

headline.main: In Italy, Rioting Leads to Recriminations
headline.print_headline: After Riot in Rome, Anger and Second-Guessing
headline.seo: In Italy, Recrimination Follows Rome Riots
